title: Petition to get the bible BANNED in Australia? ( pretty interesting story inside )
body:
Alright, so this began last week, when a petition was started by an angry catholic mother, who was appalled by this R18+ game, and moved to get it banned from sale over the Christmas period. It calls upon the game's graphic violence, sexual content ( including 'gameplay' ) and apparently encouraging sexual and physical violence towards women. Because everyone knows, the sole reason GTA5 exists is to pay hookers and then kill them for your money back.

When this passed through Target and K-mart, a lot of gamers were upset by this. I mean, it's got a rating of R18+, I really hope that parents aren't so irresponsible as to think this would be a good idea as a stocking filler. A rebuttal petition has been created, moving to get the Bible removed from stores, as it's actually got a lot of content that isn't so 'Child-friendly', and hey, anyone can buy those.

There are exact quotes from the bible ( and christian artworks of these times ) regarding women who were sexually assaulted, then publically slaughtered pretty much. A real lesson in life lies in here somewhere I'd like to hope, otherwise it'd seem that the bible-loving parents will get upset regarding their hypocrisies and ruin something else we love in the process.

If you feel like signing the petition, check it out here; tinyurl.com/BanDatBible 

Also, this is my take on the story, mostly facts, but some opinionism is included. Feel free to read up on it elsewhere before formulating your own opinion, as we encourage free thinkers here.
